WRITING.TEXT: Now you have something else to call yourself. You're welcome.
Apparently, Brexit just means Brexit.
Shut the fuck up you cock goblin.

Where's my money you son of a bitch?!
Yeah, but your mom got jealous.
I feel like this joke didn't really need explaining, but thanks anyway.
Wow.. You must have no *morels.*

WRITING.TITLE: Getting really fucking annoyed now!
WRITING.TEXT: This is the 6th ATM I've been to, that's had "insufficient funds".
Should have just made the title 'DO NOT TOUCH'.

WRITING.TITLE: Christian kittens.
WRITING.TEXT:
A preacher was taking a walk one day and happened upon a young girl who was playing with something in a cardboard box.
When he got closer he could see that the box held a litter of new-born kittens. "What kind of kittens are those?" asked the preacher. "They're Christian kittens," replied the little girl.
The preacher walked on, pleased to see that the little girl had Jesus foremost in her thoughts. A few days later the preacher saw the little girl again.
"And how are your little Christian kittens doing today?" he asked.
"Oh, they aren't Christian kittens, they're atheist kittens," replied the girl.
"But... I thought you said they were Christian kittens?" responded the preacher, concerned over the sudden change.
"Oh, they were. But now their eyes are open."

WRITING.TITLE: Therapist: "I think you have a phobia of marriage. Do you know the symptoms?"
WRITING.TEXT:
Me: "I can't say I do."
Therapist: "That's one of them."
She might be able to have a "simulated orgasm", but her face says even that's a struggle with Douglas.

WRITING.TITLE: For Christmas last year I got a sweater.
WRITING.TEXT: This year I'd prefer a moaner or a squirter.
Are you for real or are you just shiitake-n me?

WRITING.TEXT: Breakfast of Champignons.

WRITING.TEXT: She chipped her tooth on the vibrator I bought her.

Santa *paws*
I'll see myself out.
That sounds like utter disarray.
Oh did you? It must of been quite a display.

WRITING.TITLE: I got my girlfriend a fridge for her birthday.
WRITING.TEXT: I know it's not the greatest gift in the world, but you should have seen her face light up when she opened it.
Good point. Maybe we should delay.
Men don't underreact.. We just don't care as much as you think we should.
I may if you pay.
Me too. Have you seen the movie Ray?
I'm sorry, sir. Whatever you say.
In hindsight, I should have. But I didn't want to take that shit to another level.

WRITING.TITLE: I walked into an elevator today...
WRITING.TEXT:
and there was a middle aged man in there, crouching down, holding a white stick and wearing dark glasses.
After saying hello to him, there was an awkward silence between us and I was faced with a very awkward situation.
Should I help him? Will he be offended if I try to help him? Should I just let him get on with it?
Well in the end, I decided to do the right thing.
I got off at the 3rd floor and let him finish having a shit in peace.

WRITING.TITLE: I've nicknamed my grandad Spiderman.
WRITING.TEXT: He doesn't have any superpowers, he just can't climb out of the bath.

Joke DLVII
FTFY.
OP is Cray Cray.
V/VII
But.. But he called my Pokemon cards gay.
Why didn't you bring me a new bmx in 2000?

WRITING.TITLE: Newton's third law of Emotion.
WRITING.TEXT: For every male action, there is a female overreaction.
Your guess is as good as mine.
Therapist: you should leave him if all his puns are this bad.

WRITING.TITLE: I know this is r/jokes, but I have to share this with someone.
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm about to go and see the bank manager and my life will change forever. I'll finally have the money to take my kids abroad, buy my wife that car she's always wanted and have plenty left over to enjoy Christmas.
I'm talking *millions* here, guys. I can't contain my excitement, in fact, I'm so hyped up, I can barely fit this stocking over my head.

WRITING.TITLE: The devil finally gets to Hitler in hell.
WRITING.TEXT:
"What the fuck?!" Says Hitler, "nearly 70 years you've had me waiting."
"It's your own fucking fault!" Replied the devil, "have you any idea how long it takes to process 6 million Jews?"
Holy shit! The Wet Bandits have escaped again!
You mean dumb in the true sense, right? Like I'm deaf and can't talk. 'Cause *you'd* be the one to look pretty stupid if you used 2 adjectives with the same definition to insult me.
AHEM, DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT. AHEM, I JUST WISH YOU DIDN'T SPREAD THE FUCKING THING ON TO ME. AHEM.
I.. I don't see how this constitutes as annoying.
A couple of grammatical errors, but hey, nearly.
Makes sense though, I mean there's more chance of him raping someone, now he's no longer in the public eye and his wife is in hiding.
Now this... I like this.
Aren't they just regular whistles?

"Merry Christmas, Bobby. Here's an array of coloured whistles I bought you"
Yeah, still sounds pretty cheap.
I like how you ended on power tools. Like when all the noisey shit fails, just put them kids in danger. The constant protecting will annoy the hell outta them parents.
Hey, fuck you! I may be obvious and racist, but I'm also pretty fucking funny!
A paintball gun *does* sound annoying. But I plan on maintaining my friendship.
I'd feel a bit of a cheap skate if I just bought him a whistle.
Yeah... I'm English and don't really wanna chance prison.
Your comment was a lot more diplomatic than mine. I love benevolent replies, and I'm glad you sent this one. Haha. Will upvote.

AHEM, I LIKE TO USE CAPS TOO, WHEN POINTING OUT PLAGIARISM, AHEM.
Haha that made me laugh! African Americans can't read!

This reply was not as funny as it could have been. I love reading replies, but this one is like "hey, this looks like a pretty neat bandwagon to jump on, and I might get some karma for it! Haha!" Would not recommend.
This comment was not as funny as expected. I love criticising comments, but this one is like "I'm bored so I'm just gonna explain the set-up to 80% of black jokes! Haha!" Would not recommend.
That guy on the phone is like, "hold on Phil, I'll have to call you back later. This acid has me tripping balls."

WRITING.TITLE: I slipped on some black ice yesterday.
WRITING.TEXT: At first I thought it was regular ice, but when I got back on my feet, I noticed my wallet was gone.
How did you know? Come to think of it, I haven't been allowed near knives since then, either.
No. I'm not allowed near a toaster or grill unsupervised.
I used to. Although, now I find a spoon to be superior. Doesn't put a hole in your bread if you butter too rough, either.
Damn, that looks amazing... I mean just *look* at that pastry.

Eat a lot and drink even more.
Spend time with family.
Discuss moistness of turkey, and act surprised at how big it is.
They can't provide clarity to themselves, regarding the single market, never mind the Japanese.
I find if you throw fruit at any professional, it generally keeps them all away.

WRITING.TITLE: I've had enough of Christmas!
WRITING.TEXT:
All year long I work my fingers to the bone to buy all the presents that my kids asked for, and what happens on Christmas morning? That fat fucker with the beard gets all the credit for it.
Still, I suppose it was my fault for marrying her.
